Detailed Description

template<typename Robot, int start_node_id, int end_node_id, int offset = 0, bool includeFreeFlyer = true, bool call_bcalc = true>
struct metapod::jac_point_chain< Robot, start_node_id, end_node_id, offset, includeFreeFlyer, call_bcalc >

Point in Chain Articular Jacobian Algorithm.

Template Parameters:
RobotRobot type for which jacobian is computed.
StartBodyStart body type in sub-chain for which jacobian is computed.
EndBodyEnd body type in sub-chain for which jacobian is computed.
offsetRank of first non zero jacobian column.
includeFreeFlyerBoolean type to specify the contribution of a fictive free-flyer joint superposed with the joint of StartBody.
call_bcalcBoolean type to specify whether all body transforms need to be updated with respect to the robot configuration.

Member Typedef Documentation

template<typename Robot, int start_node_id, int end_node_id, int offset = 0, bool includeFreeFlyer = true, bool call_bcalc = true>
typedef solver::Jacobian metapod::jac_point_chain< Robot, start_node_id, end_node_id, offset, includeFreeFlyer, call_bcalc >::Jacobian
template<typename Robot, int start_node_id, int end_node_id, int offset = 0, bool includeFreeFlyer = true, bool call_bcalc = true>
typedef jac_point_relative<Robot, start_node_id, end_node_id, offset - 6*(1-includeFreeFlyer), call_bcalc> metapod::jac_point_chain< Robot, start_node_id, end_node_id, offset, includeFreeFlyer, call_bcalc >::solver

Member Function Documentation

template<typename Robot, int start_node_id, int end_node_id, int offset = 0, bool includeFreeFlyer = true, bool call_bcalc = true>
metapod::jac_point_chain< Robot, start_node_id, end_node_id, offset, includeFreeFlyer, call_bcalc >::METAPOD_STATIC_ASSERT ( (Robot::NBDOF >=6)  ,
"jac_point_chain< Robot, start_node_id, end_node_id, offset, includeFreeFlyer, call_bcalc > does not support robots with less than 6 DoFs"   
)
template<typename Robot, int start_node_id, int end_node_id, int offset = 0, bool includeFreeFlyer = true, bool call_bcalc = true>
static void metapod::jac_point_chain< Robot, start_node_id, end_node_id, offset, includeFreeFlyer, call_bcalc >::run ( Robot &  robot,
const typename Robot::confVector &  q,
const Vector3d &  e_p,
Jacobian &  J 
) [inline, static]

Compute the articular jacobian J.

Parameters:
qConfiguration vector: it is used to update all body spatial transforms if bcalc is equal to true.
e_pCoordinates of point in EndBody coordinates.
Return values:
JComputed jacobian of size 6x(NBDOF+offset) if free-flyer is included, 6x(NBDOF-6+offset) otherwise.
